responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "620775DA4DF87A303B0E1FA5304F1934", "Yes. I have spoken with scholars of the academy. The artifact was crafted by a Sephillion mage in the ancient times. His name was Ozu and his Star could tap into essence while shooting out rays of varying effects. Mass blindness is one and it is the one Uulorian hopes to use. We must prepare to stop him. Too early and he will run and hide. Too late and we will all be without sight. We must wait for the first ray of light.")
name: MADD_0005A_BDA_EudoxiaAvenmoor_Phase02_39
